article.description: Jayrn Johnson scored 21 points and blocked three shots to help Prairie View A&M snap a seven-game losing streak and upset Southwestern Athletic Conference leader Texas Southern 59-55 on Saturday
article.headline: Prarie View A&M upsets Texas Southern 59-55
article.linkText: Prarie View A&M upsets Texas Southern 59-55
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Jayrn Johnson scored 21 points and blocked three shots to help Prairie View A&M snap a seven-game losing streak and upset Southwestern Athletic Conference leader Texas Southern 59-55 on Saturday night. Adamassu Williams finished with 11 points for Prairie View A&M (2-20, 2-8) which is last place in the conference. The defeat snapped the Tigers' nine-game win streak and was their first conference setback of the season. Williams' 3-point play put the Panthers up 48-40 with 8:06 to play. Johnson's 3 a minute-and-a-half later made it 51-42. Texas Southern went on a 7-1 run and Malcom Riley's layup cut the deficit to 52-49. Riley then made a 3 with 20 seconds to go, trimming it to 54-52. Prairie View then shot 5 for 6 from the free throw line to clinch the win. Chris Thomas led Texas Southern (10-12, 9-1) with 16 points, Riley had 15 and Derrick Griffin chipped in 11.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
